overview: HARTSBEGEERTES deals with every day circumstances with the focus on two families and their struggles with life and its greater purpose.  Through the lives of the two main characters, Pieter (Renier Weideman) and James (Jacques Gombault), the reality of lifeâ€™s circumstances are being sketched. In their darkest hour they discover hope, love and a greater purpose in life.
title: Hartsbegeertes
